author: jsdelfino
msg: Add a test case showing how to register a ProviderFactory instance. Minor cleanup, add a createNode method that takes a list of contributions and remove reference to NodeFactory implementation class.

author: djencks
msg: GERONIMO-434 for ee jndi go back to getting the connection factory each time from the connection manager since osgi jndi caches the connection factory for us

msg: PIG-1482: Pig gets confused when more than one loader is involved (xuefuz via thejas)

author: cutting
msg: Minor updates to ignores, manifests, & READMEs, cleanups for 1.4.

author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-877. compiler: smalltalk namespace doesn't work
This patch adds a special case to map 'smalltalk' to 'st' when checking for valid namespace declarations.
